General.Name: Zhejiang XinNong Chemical Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Zhejiang XinNong Chemical Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and markets pesticides and pharmaceutical intermediates in China. The company also exports its products to Southeast Asia, Europe, the United States, Australia, and Africa. Zhejiang XinNong Chemical Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
